Dialogue.Page: Grabbro again. Hornfels wasn't convinced by my initial assessment of the satellite and wanted me to head back out here to double check my work.
Normally I'd resent being asked to do the same job twice. But I picked up some supplies that will let me do something I've wanted to try for a while.
See, dozing off is great but there are two things that can make it better. One: a warm campfire. And two: zero gravity.
How relaxing would it be to combine both? That's what I want to... find... out...

Ha! That's potent. I didn't even mean to doze off but the satellite's already halfway around the sun. That's gotta be the best nap I've had in ages. Ten minutes of warm, crackling, zero-gravity bliss.
